## elements() function

Creates a function that can be used to filter a Node array, selecting only elements.

**Signature:**

```typescript
elements: (selector?: string) => ElementsFilter
```

<table><thead><tr><th>

</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

selector


</td><td>

string


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ An optional selector to restrict the filter to.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

[ElementsFilter](../fast-element.elementsfilter/)
